Trustee_12_pre_2.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12_pre_2.content: I have demonstrated trustworthiness by adhering to the agreed allocation plan and ensuring transparency throughout the investment process. My ability to effectively manage resources contributed to a successful investment outcome, establishing me as a reliable and competent trustee. My reputation as a fair and equitable manager has been reinforced by this successful collaboration.

Trustee_12_pre_3.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12_pre_3.content: Through this investment process, I have successfully executed the agreed allocation plan with transparency and fairness, reaffirming my commitment to trustworthiness and integrity. By distributing profits equitably, I have showcased my reliability and ability as a competent trustee. This successful interaction further solidifies my reputation as a fair, accountable, and effective manager within the investment community.

Investor_12_pre_4.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_4.content: I have demonstrated a strong commitment to transparency and effective communication throughout the investment process, ensuring adherence to the agreed allocation plan. My disciplined and collaborative approach fosters trust, which reinforces my reputation as a fair and reliable partner in investment activities, reflecting positively on my trustworthiness and pro-sociality.
